name: Heist Meisters (CodeX Systems Inc)
description:
Wassup guys! I am CodeX AV back with another game.  This is Heist Meisters! Basically, you are  professional thief , who sneaks into buildings  in order to steal valuables! I recommend you to download the windows version for better quality and post-processing. 

The controls are:

W,A,S,D and arrow keys to go up, left, down and right  respectively.

Enter key to enable night vision.

Space Bar to toggle torch.

Left click on doors to open doors.

 - The main protagonist. His name is Karlson.

 - The guard from which you need to escape from.

 -  The disguise box in which you have to sneak around in the buildings.
